original_text: While the priests made a noise on the trumpets, some soldiers marched in front of them. Another group of soldiers followed behind the Covenant Box. The trumpets were making a noise all this time.
korean_text: 그 무장한 자들은 나팔 부는 제사장들 앞에서 행진하며 후군은 궤 뒤를 따르고 제사장들은 나팔을 불며 행진하더라

sentences.original_text: While the priests made a noise on the trumpets,
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들이 나팔을 불면서 소리를 내는 동안,

sentences.original_text: some soldiers marched in front of them.
Another group of soldiers followed behind the Covenant Box.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 군인 그룹이 언약궤 뒤를 따랐습니다.

sentences.original_text: The trumpets were making a noise all this time.
sentences.korean_translation: 나팔들은 이 모든 시간 동안 소리를 내고 있었습니다.
